Using The Jobs Category

03 May 1999

This category is essentially for posting help wanted ads for Web development jobs. <shameless plug> It only makes sense to advertise among the best, and evolt.org is comprised of such highly talented Web developers, how could you NOT post job openings here?</plug>

Evoltians should feel free to ask questions of prospective employers, but I can't personally guarantee they'll answer them. :)
